name: The Secret of "HanZi"
description: This is a puzzle game with the theme of Chinese New Year and the "福" character. Players need to observe the 3D scene and related items and scenes related to Chinese New Year and the "福" character to learn more about traditional Chinese culture and customs. The game only has one level, but it contains rich content and interactivity. At the same time, the game also has a question-and-answer system. Players need to answer questions in each level to proceed to the next level. Come and experience this interesting game to learn more about Chinese culture!
